posts.post_title: WTB Ed Abbaticchio Blue Sleeves PSA 2-3
posts.post_content:
WTB Ed Abbaticchio Blue Sleeves graded PSA 2-3, nicely centered. EPDG, Old Mill, Sov 460 preferred, however I’m interested in any back to fill this spot. Please send scan and what price you’re looking for. Thanks for your help.
